A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a huge disappointment. We had waited two years to see Mark Hamil shine again in his role as Luke Skywalker. Instead\, they had him cast as a bumbling fool.  They wasted our time showing characters we don't care about running around a casino looking for a code breaker that they never met. The dark side is now led by a whiny little kid. There are so many other upsetting things. You had an opportunity to make a great movie and you threw it away.
